subject: Cheap!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I paid $2 for this, glued a stick on the tuning knob, instant ghost box.
Manual sweep works just as good as anything else, unless you're trying to
look cool on TV or the latest superduper haunted hot spot. At 8 seconds
"Look, boxes with him", starts out "Hi Mary" but not sure that has any
meaning.

F-S
